member.name: P:Plugin.SimpleAudioPlayer.SimpleAudioPlayerImplementation.CurrentPosition
member.Summary: Current position of audio in seconds

member.name: P:Plugin.SimpleAudioPlayer.SimpleAudioPlayerImplementation.Balance
member.Summary: Balance left/right: -1 is 100% left : 0% right, 1 is 100% right : 0% left, 0 is equal volume left/right

member.name: P:Plugin.SimpleAudioPlayer.SimpleAudioPlayerImplementation.IsPlaying
member.Summary: Indicates if the currently loaded audio file is playing

member.name: P:Plugin.SimpleAudioPlayer.SimpleAudioPlayerImplementation.CanSeek
member.Summary: Indicates if the position of the loaded audio file can be updated

member.name: M:Plugin.SimpleAudioPlayer.SimpleAudioPlayerImplementation.Load(System.String)
member.Summary: Load wave or mp3 audio file from Assets folder
